titles.title: To amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act, regarding Huna Totem Corporation public interest land exchange, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Executive Comment Requested from USDA, Interior.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-784.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 445.

bill.summary: 11/13/1997--Introduced. Amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide for an exchange of: (1) surface estate between the United States and the Huna Totem Corporation; and (2) subsurface estate between the United States and the Sealaska Corporation. Prohibits Huna Totem Corporation from directly or indirectly exporting out of Alaska unprocessed logs or timber from such received land.
